tasks.label: 📚 Show Task Categories
tasks.command: Write-Host '🎯 PowerShell Task Categories Available:' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host ''; Write-Host '📁 .vscode/tasks/' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host '  ├── 🚀 unified-profile/     - Profile installation & setup' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host '  ├── 🧛‍♂️ dracula-profile/     - Dracula theme & variants' -ForegroundColor Magenta; Write-Host '  ├── ⚡ performance/        - Performance testing & optimization' -ForegroundColor Yellow; Write-Host '  ├── 🔐 google-hardware-key/ - Hardware key management' -ForegroundColor Blue; Write-Host '  ├── 🎨 oh-my-posh/         - Oh My Posh themes & integration' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Write-Host '  └── 📚 documentation/      - Documentation & build tasks' -ForegroundColor Gray; Write-Host ''; Write-Host '💡 Use VS Code Command Palette (Ctrl+Shift+P) → "Tasks: Run Task"' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host '   Then select from the organized task categories above!' -ForegroundColor Green

tasks.label: 🔧 Reload VS Code Tasks
tasks.command: Write-Host '🔄 Reloading VS Code window to refresh tasks...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
